T02D2863:200a-1: po sha dha ka ri n'i ya /
T02D2863:200a-4: 'phags pa don yod zhags pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2863:200a-5: sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la //
T02D2863:200a-6: byang chub bar du bdag skyabs mchi //
T02D2863:200a-7: bdag dang gzhan don rab bsgrub phyir //
T02D2863:200a-8: byang chub sems 'di bskyed par bgyi //
T02D2863:200a-9: sdig pa thams cad bshags bgyid cing //
T02D2863:200a-10: bsod nams la yang rjes yi rang //
T02D2863:200a-11: 'phags pa'i gso sbyong yan lag brgyad //
T02D2863:200a-12: bsnyen pa la ni spyad par bgyi'o //
T02D2863:200a-13: bcom ldan bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02D2863:200a-14: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni //
T02D2863:200a-15: dus 'di nas bzung ji srid nas //
T02D2863:200a-16: nyi ma'i 'od ni me shar bar //
T02D2863:200a-17: srog chags gdon dang gzhan nor 'phrog / mi tshangs spyod dang bden min smra //
T02D2863:200a-18: myos pa bskyed dang bzhon pa dang //
T02D2863:200a-19: dus ni ma yin pa yi zas //
T02D2863:200a-20: phreng ba kha dog glu dang gar //
T02D2863:200a-21: khri stan mthon po la sogs pa //
T02D2863:200b-0: thams cad bdag gis @200b spang bgyid cing //
T02D2863:200b-1: 'phags pa'i yon tan brgyad spyad dang //
T02D2863:200b-2: gso sbyong khrims sdom yi dam 'di //
T02D2863:200b-3: sems kyi rgyan sems kyi yo byad rnal 'byor gyi tshogs mchog tu don dam pa'i sangs rgyas nyid /
T02D2863:200b-4: thob pa la ni 'od 'dis reg gyur cig / byang chub mchog gi sems 'di bskyed bgyis la //
T02D2863:200b-5: sems can thams cad bdag gis mgron du gnyer //
T02D2863:200b-6: byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad nas ni //
T02D2863:200b-7: 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /
T02D2863:200b-8: kha che'i pandi ta chen po sh'akya shr'i bha dras
